tags.name: prisoner-merge-controller
tags.description: Create operation for bookings in NOMIS. This is used when court cases are cloned onto different bookings

tags.name: legacy-court-appearance-controller
tags.description: CRUD operations for syncing court appearance data from NOMIS Court Events into remand and sentencing api database.

tags.name: legacy-court-case-controller
tags.description: CRUD operations for syncing court case data from NOMIS into remand and sentencing api database.

tags.name: migration-controller
tags.description: Create operation for migrating court case data from NOMIS into remand and sentencing api database.

tags.name: legacy-sentence-controller
tags.description: CRUD operations for syncing sentence data from NOMIS Offender sentences into remand and sentencing api database.

tags.name: legacy-recall-controller
tags.description: GET operation for syncing recall data. This controller is only ever used for syncing DPS recalls to NOMIS.

tags.name: booking-controller
tags.description: Create operation for bookings in NOMIS. This is used when court cases are cloned onto different bookings

tags.name: legacy-period-length-controller
tags.description: CRUD operations for syncing period-length data between NOMIS and RAS (period-lengths are called sentence-terms in NOMIS)

tags.name: legacy-charge-controller
tags.description: CRUD operations for syncing charge data from NOMIS Offender charges into remand and sentencing api database.

tags.name: uploaded-documents-controller
tags.description: Endpoint for creating a record of an uploaded document

tags.name: legacy-prisoner-controller
tags.description: CRUD operations for getting prisoner data

get.summary: Retrieve all dates to be used in validation
get.description:
This endpoint returns the most recent offence start or end date across all appearances and charges for a given court case.  
      This endpoint also returns the latest remand appearance date for a given court case.
      Optionally, the result can exclude offences tied to a specific court appearance, used when editing a court appearance in the UI (the latest version of the offence dates are in the UI session).

get.summary: Retrieve the latest offence date for a court case (checks both offence start and end dates)
get.description:
This endpoint returns the most recent offence start or end date across all appearances and charges for a given court case.     
      Optionally, the result can exclude offences tied to a specific court appearance, used when editing a court appearance in the UI (the latest version of the offence dates are in the UI session).
